item.title: Mind Crystal Mystery Part 5
item.description: A nighttime stakeout turns into an all-out magical battle when Pirie, Henry, Lucy, and Holly catch Professor Kate placing mind-controlling crystals around The Academy. As cave trolls with glowing red eyes emerge from the Dark Forest, students rush to defend their school with spells, illusions, and magical teamwork. But when Hamish the dragon wizard joins the fight, Kate's shocking betrayal changes everything... Feed: https://feeds.redcircle.com/440cd39a-386a-482f-90e6-5a5a0d0a4259

item.title: AI Slop Summer
item.description: We start this week with Jason's couple of stories about how the Chicago Sun-Times printed a summer guide that was basically all AI-generated. Jason spoke to the person behind it. After the break, a bunch of documents show that schools were simply not ready for AI. In the subscribers-only section, we chat all about Star Wars and those funny little guys. YouTube version: https://youtu... Feed: https://feeds.megaphone.fm/TBIEA2761282490
